feed.title: Bug Alert
feed.subtitle: A service for alerting security and IT professionals of high-impact and 0day vulnerabilities.

entry.title: Bug Alert is Live
entry.summary: Hello, world! Bug Alert is now live. Read the announcement post at https://mattslifebytes.com/2022/01/04/bugalert-org/ to learn more.
entry.content: I'm happy announce that Bug Alert is now generally-available! Read the announcement post at https://mattslifebytes.com/2022/01/04/bugalert-org/ for background and further information.

entry.title: RCE in Log4j
entry.summary: A remote code execution vulnerability has been found in the popular Java logging library Log4j. This issue is easily exploited in common configurations, and has been assigned a bug alert severity of 'critical'.
entry.content: On Tuesday, December 9th, 2021, a security researcher posted a screenshot and proof-of-concept code for executing an RCE against the latest available build of the popular Java logging library, Log4j. For up-to-date information, please visit https://www.lunasec.io/docs/blog/log4j-zero-day/.
